籤詩版本二:
U-Lin Wei uyingwe egada umnyango, Kumelwe abe namandla futhi angalimazi abanye.
Kushiwo ngokucacile ukuthi akukho ukuqapha Ukukhathazeka, ukungabaza, ukwesaba nokwesaba kusehlathini → ukhuni.
詩意:
Kule hexagram, izihlahla zehlathi namahlosi anesithombe esinamandla.
Wonke ama-alamu angamanga awangempela kangako.
解曰: Isitofu sikhanyisa iqhwa. Kungathi umoya uwele ezindlebeni ezingezwa. Kungaba isibusiso. Izinto ezinhle ziyalandela futhi ezimbi zenzeka phambi kwazo.
籤詩故事一:
◇UPang Hong wesaba i-Bao Gong
I-Renzong Yobukhosi Bengoma. U-Bao Gong ungumbusi wase-Kaifeng Prefecture (igama elisemthethweni, elilingana ne-prefect). UPang Hong wayengumukhwe (umkhwenyana wombusi) futhi eboshiwe uGeneral Di Qing. Lapho u-Bao Gong ecela ukuqulwa kwecala, uPang Hong wethuka futhi walivimba ngezindlela eziningi. Kamuva, icala lavela futhi ukumangalelwa okungamanga kukaPang Hong kwaqinisekiswa. Wahanjiswa esimisweni sobukhosi sika-Emperor Renzong we-Song Dynasty futhi wakhululwa ngenxa yezihlobo zakhe.
聖意: Ukungakhululeki ekhaya, amazwi omuntu siqu, ukucela imali, ibhizinisi lesikhohlakali, umshado ongathandeki, umshwalense wamanga waseLiujia, ukuvimbela abahamba ngezinyawo, ukulimala kwemisundu kasilika, ukulimala kwemfuyo eyisithupha, umuntu olahlekile, icala lomphakathi, ukulahlekelwa, ukufuduka, ukugcinwa kwemvelo, ukulahleka kwempahla, ukugula, umhlatshelo. , Hushani ithuna, ububi
